channel.title: How can i server files?
channel.description: i need to change the server name but how can i do that.for ex: the files of soure and client is like l33t scape source +l33tscape client but i want it to be in soulscapepk source+ soulscapepk client

item.title: How can i server files?
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:3, topic:365157”]just be careful what you edit, some things are client sided too, like (obviously client name), gui buttons, which i believe are found in gui.java and other files in the client files,or if they have items named after the server/ npcs, custom item ints are in class8.java, custom npc ints are in class5.java[/quote]ints? Still can’t see why people call if statements/else clauses “ints”

Read full topic

item.title: How can i server files?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

just be careful what you edit, some things are client sided too, like (obviously client name), gui buttons, which i believe are found in gui.java and other files in the client files,or if they have items named after the server/ npcs, custom item ints are in class8.java, custom npc ints are in class5.java

Read full topic

Try looking in the TextHandler class or even the client class.
